Params: {3: "Orienting herself, Bianca moves toward the Gray Raven Commandant's position."}
{3: "The aquarium's original drainage system kicks into gear, slowly pulling the seawater out of the passageway. The Red Tide, a murky serpent, slithers along both sides of the path."}
{3: 'Maybe these M.I.N.D. disturbances are just lingering effects of the severe Punishing Virus corruption. Hazily, Bianca catches glimpses of indistinct "shadows" along both sides of her path.'}
{3: 'In the church amid the wind and snow, she sees herself praying devoutly.'}
{3: "Dressed in a nun's robe, she has knelt countless times before the statue, hands clasped, praying for the children to be fed, for people's safety, for God's people to find salvation, for..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Father Snow', 3: 'My neural network ran sophisticated calculations and the conclusion I reached was that, even the angel of love was nothing compared to her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Father Snow', 3: 'I raised her up. Mechanoids have no concept of time, but I found that 9460800 minutes passed by in a flash.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Father Snow', 3: 'If only I could see Bianca... my child, grow up.', 4: '1'}
{1: "God loves and blesses the world, but as a mechanoid, I don't need or even receive such blessings or protection.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 7: '1'}
{1: 'Still, if my constant prayers and piety mean anything...', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 7: '1'}
{1: 'Please protect my child, Bianca... and all the other human children like her.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 7: '1'}
{1: "God, if I ever lose myself, I'm ready to face any judgment and punishment...", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 7: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: 'She once prayed for divine guidance, hoping it would show her the way forward and help her make the right choice...'}
{3: 'She sees the Construct, bound by a restraint device, standing behind that door, staring ahead with lifeless eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wen', 3: "This is why I despise talkative people. If it weren't for that useless human waste earlier, we wouldn't be in this predicament right now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wen', 3: "What we sell is safety, and safety is achieved by weapons and strength. And what's the most powerful weapon in our era? I'm sure you know the answer yourself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wen', 3: 'You are my finest creation. Except for that little flaw of yours—your faith, which prevented me from wiping your consciousness clean.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wen', 3: 'But one thing you have in common with the other products is that, like all weapons, you have a limited lifespan.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wen', 3: 'Don\'t waste your energy struggling. Soon, you\'ll be the same as those Constructs you\'ve "cleaned up".', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She dropped her hands, no longer knowing how to offer her prayers to God.'}
{3: 'She had prayed countless times, yet God only rewarded her with suffering.'}
{3: 'She sees the defecting Constructs who were slain—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Defecting Construct', 3: "Purifying Force... it's the witch from the Purifying Force!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Defecting Construct', 3: "Why? Why are you coming after me?! I haven't done anything wrong!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Defecting Construct', 3: "I just... I just wanted to live... That's only why I sold information about the Task Force to—", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'But it troubles me sometimes as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Why would I have conflicting thoughts when I claim to abide by my faith...?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=65>Hands once clasped in prayer now reach for guns.</size></color>', 3: '-350', 4: '50'}
{1: '1', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=65>Palms that once held lilies now grip a bow.</size></color>', 3: '350', 4: '50'}
{3: 'Hands once clasped in prayer now reach for guns. Palms that once held lilies now grip a bow.'}
{3: "Her hands aren't soft or warm anymore; they've turned to cold metal, covered in countless scars..."}
{3: 'She has silently kept her prayers while others brand her knuckles with all sorts of labels. Yet, she seems to have forgotten, whether in her prayers or killings...'}
{1: '2', 2: "<color=#ffffffff><size=60>She's always been the one behind those hands.</size></color>", 4: '50', 11: '1'}
{3: "She's always been the one behind those hands."}
{1: "It's your faith that makes you strong.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 7: '-1', 10: '1'}
{1: "It's your contradictions that give you your gentleness.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 7: '-1', 10: '1'}
{3: 'Falling in the midst of seawater, she finds herself again.'}
{3: 'Light and shadow play tricks, shimmering as strange illusions twist and form within the Red Tide. Countless memories—some hers, some not—steadily flood her M.I.N.D.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Are these Red Tide Projections... just hallucinations in my M.I.N.D.?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Images she's never seen before flicker within the Red Tide."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'If we can still talk like this after this battle...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "What will you say to me, seeing what I've become?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Without missing a beat, Bianca presses on toward the commandant's location."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "You would probably be pleased to see... what I've become."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Whether it's about faith or bloodshed, light or shadow..."}
{3: 'The female Construct, longsword in hand, relentlessly carves through the sealed door ahead.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I am a Holy Maiden, also a witch. I am... Bianca.'}
